participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, but struggles with financial management.
participant_1.background: I love to shop. I drive a bmw. I have a lot of friends. I am in debt. I am single.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a deep passion for meaningful conversations.
participant_2.background: My back hurts chronically. I am an old soul. I tend to work myself up. I am passionate about a lot of things. I just want my voice to be heard.
